channel.title: winget on Machine Learning
channel.description: Recent content in winget on Machine Learning

item.title: Windows Package Managers
item.description: Chocolatey https://chocolatey.org/install usage: choco install javaruntime; choco install graphviz winget https://github.com/microsoft/winget-cli/releases (the .appxbundle) usage: winget install -e --id Oracle.JavaRuntimeEnvironment; winget install graphviz t install graphviz`
